>
>  >
> > Shokaract: You underestimate my power. You shall be incinerated. I
command
> > you to fire, Mob!
> >
> > Shokaract fired his 3 missiles at  Necromancer.
>
> "You haven't learned yet that I can not be incinerated." Necromancer
boasts
> as he dodges one missle, catches the second and throws it to intercept the
> third.
> >
> > Gigas threw a boulder, seemingly that he created, at Necromancer.
> >
> The dragon swatted the boulder aside reducing it to rubble  The rubble was
> reduced to dust as .Kracken raised his many tentacles and started firing
> machine gun style from
> > them. some of the shots made it through and struck the mighty maximal
> warrior forcing him to cover his eyes with his left arm. he raised his
rifle
> and returned fire with a barrage of laser blasts in the direction from
where
> the machine gun fire was coming from.
> >
> > Horn Drill fired 2 horn missiles at Necromancer. 1 missle struck
> Necromancers useless left wing causing him to call out in pain. He dove
into
> a crater that was created during the battle and the second missle sailed
> over his head.
> >
> > Grenade fired his machine gun rapidly at Necromancer, since he seemed to
> be
> > resistant to fire. Necromancer stayed down in the crater, he knew that
his
> hide would protect him from any projectile impact thathe'd encounter but
> stayed under cover to be sure. he opened a comm throughout the
battlefield.
> "Necromancer to any nearby Maximals, I'm under heavy fire and outnumbered,
> I'm badly hurt and can't transform, I need reinforcements ASAP."
> >
> > Beholder 2 shot 2 missiles at Necromancer..Missles hit outside the
crater
> causing dirt and debris to fall on top of him. He picked up his head and
> fires an ice bolt from his rifle toward Beholder..
> >
